segments.text: I'm looking at this domestic scene, and a feeling of sadness washes over me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her chore, completely unaware of the dangers around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The overflowing sink is creating a hazard, a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a shame that she's missing all these crucial details.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children's mischief, while common, is also fraught with peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks so unstable, I just know the boy is going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for those cookies with such innocent determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the little girl, her hand held out, full of hopeful anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart aches thinking about the possible injuries.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A slip on the wet floor, a tumble from the stool, broken dishes everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It paints such a bleak picture of what's about to unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm outside world seems so far removed from this impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them, prevent the inevitable accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
